Articles.Content:
Nope.

User below me is a panda bear

Perhaps...

The user below me is grateful that trekkette bumped the meaningful game threads

Um... .can I be grateful to myself??

User below me runs an RPG.

Nope...Or at least no according to Odin.

The user below me loves In-jokes

Only when I get them!

User below me will not be Rage

<.<

>.>

Nope, sorry.

The user below me has grey eyes

Only my avatar does...

User below me is Texan. Yeehaw~

That be the whooooole truth y'all

The user below me enjoys dialect jokes.

try "loves in an inappropriate way" ;P

User below me has an accent when compared to the Midwestern USA.

Nope. (fun fact: I have no accent what so ever)

The user below me has found Thread! on the SCP wiki.

Nope, I avoid SCP-Wiki like the plague.

The user below me is male.

According to a possibly unreliable source: True!

The user below me trusts the internet too much.

... kinda, I guess

The user below me can sing well.

No.

The user below me is LOLing

True xD

The user below me has ksp for steam.

I don;'t even have KSP, and after recent events, I may not even be getting it...

The user below me regularly falls asleep watching TV.

What's TV?

The user below me finds TV useless because of youtube/hulu.

eh, I do watch most stuff online, too. Right now I'm watching Duck Dynasty with my father. SAVE ME

User below me has no idea what Duck Dynasty is. You lucky squid.

False. Discovery/whatevs has been corrupted by reality shows.

The user below me Is a kitten.

I wish to reincarnated as one, however I have not been that well-behaved.

The user below me is enjoying the back and forth Rage and I have going on all over the Games forum.

True.

The user below me Realized that the "why is this guy banned" thread is missing O.o

I didn't even know that was a thread...

the user below me clearly spends too much time on the forums...

True.

The user below me was supposed to fill in a name there.

I was? Whose? Where?

The user below me will explain.

Half-True (starts with a "C")

The user below me feels slightly stupid, but gets over it.
